name: Mountain Race (MrFoxii)
description:
You drive a car and have to finish in a minimum of time the race and at the arrival you have your best time, you can restart for trying to make a better time. 

The car is equiped of a new generation of boost with a delay of 5 seconds between every boost. 

Please try to not crash the car i can't afford to buy another one.

Controls  : 

- ZQSD : driving

- Space Bar : Boost

- R : restart
